review: While it's fun to be able to watch streaming Amazon Prime on a large tv, within a week of starting to use the Firestick it was no longer streaming Netflix.  This is a big limitation since we had hoped to be able to stream all of our tv on it.  Also, much of the tv or movies that I would like to show my children are for rent instead of included in my membership.  Since Prime is the only thing I can stream right now,  I may return it.
author: Pen Name

review: The best Tv streaming device I have ever used for the price. It's much cheaper compared to other devices like the roku or google tv. I have had zero problems with it, no endless buffers or bad video quality. You will be happy that you chose to buy this. I would recommend the Fire tv, but this is like $60 less. It's nice that the device is so small and discrete, less cords and cables. People don't like the device because they say if you lose the remote its just a useless stick...That is so wrong... There is this crazy thing called apps. I downloaded a remote app and it works with zero problems. So yeah, this is a great product and I recommend it to everyone!
